Hierbei handelt es sich um den Endbestan: This is the closing balance of the previous period
Der Bedarf berechnet der verschiedenen P: The demand calculated for the different periods is calculated from a matrix multiplication of the production program and the use in the final results
Der Bestand berechnet sich durch den Anf: The stock is calculated by subtracting the opening stock with the requirements of the corresponding periods
Der Kapazitätsbedarf berechnet sich aus: The capacity requirement is calculated from the sum of the required working minutes per product for a workplace
Die Rüstzeit ist mit Erfahrungswerten vo: The set-up time is pre-filled with empirical values but can be changed accordingly
Der Rückstand aus der Vorperiode vom Kap: The backlog from the previous period of capacity requirements are the added times of orders in the queue or in process that are required for each work center
Der Rückstand aus der Vorperiode an Rüst: The set-up time backlog from the previous period is determined from the sum of the set-up times of all the orders per work center that are not yet being processed in this work center and therefore have to be set up first
Der Gesamt-Kapazitätsbedarf berechnet si: The total capacity requirement is calculated from the sum of the 4 previous lines
Die Schichten und Überstunden werden bas: The shifts and overtime are calculated based on the total capacity requirement. Overtime is always preferred, if overtime would exceed 240 minutes per day, a new shift will be added.
Geplanter Lagerbestand am Ende der Planp: Planned inventory at the end of the plan period
Lagerbestand am Ende der Vorperiode: Inventory at the end of the previous period
KonventionalstraLagerbestand am Ende der: Inventory at the end of the previous period
